meta.name: Personalize creator onboarding in HubSpot with influencers.club and GPT-4

name: Personalize creator onboardings with social platforms data

parameters.content:
## üéØ Creator Onboarding Personalization Workflow

**What this does:**
- Enriches creator profiles at signup using email
- Determines platform focus & creator tier
- Personalizes onboarding experience

**Requirements:**
- influencers.club API key
- Trigger source (HubSpot/Webhook/Google Sheets/DB)
- Database/CRM to store enriched data

**Template Variables:**
- API_ENDPOINT: Set in HTTP Request credentials
- YOUR_CRM: Configure in final node

nodes.name: OpenAI GPT-4
nodes.notes: ‚öôÔ∏è CONFIGURE: Add your OpenAI API key

nodes.name: Merge AI + Rules
nodes.notes: Combine niche analysis with tier classification

nodes.name: Aggregate Final Data
nodes.notes: Combine all data into single object

parameters.content:
## üéØ ALTERNATIVE TRIGGERS

Replace HubSpot trigger with:

**Webhook:**
- Generic webhook node
- POST to: webhook-url
- Body: {"email": "creator@email.com"}

**Google Sheets:**
- Google Sheets trigger
- Watch for new rows
- Extract email column

**Your Database:**
- PostgreSQL/MySQL trigger
- Watch new creator signups
- Extract email field

## üì• STEP 1: Get New Signups

**Options:**
- HubSpot contact creation trigger (configured)
- Webhook for custom integrations
- Google Sheets for batch processing
- Your CRM trigger

**What gets extracted:**
- Creator email (required)
- Contact ID for updating later
- Any custom fields you need

## üîç STEP 2: Enrich Creator Profile

**API Call to influencers.club**
- Uses /public/v1/creators/enrich/email/
- Input: Creator email
- Output: Complete main-platform profile

**Configure:**
1. Add your API key to HTTP Header Auth
2. Error handling sends to fallback flow

## üéØ STEP 3: AI-Powered Personalization

**Two parallel analyses:**

**A) Niche Analysis (AI)**
- Uses GPT-4 to determine primary niche
- Decides which modules to enable
- Returns structured recommendations

**B) Tier Classification (Rule-based)**
- Nano: <10k followers
- Micro: 10k-100k followers  
- Macro: 100k+ followers
- Enables tier-specific features

**Both merge** to create complete personalization config

## üíæ STEP 4: Save to Your CRM

**Update creator record**
- Saves enriched data to HubSpot/your CRM
- Updates contact with:
  - Platform links
  - Follower counts
  - Tier classification
  - Niche assignment
  - Custom properties

**Configure:**
- Map fields to your CRM schema
- Add custom properties as needed

nodes.name: Enrich by Email
nodes.notes: ‚öôÔ∏è CONFIGURE: Add your influencers.club API key in credentials

nodes.name: AI Niche Analyzer
nodes.notes: GPT-4 determines primary niche and module recommendations

parameters.text:
=SYSTEM ROLE:
You are a Product Intelligence Agent for a creator platform.

TASK:
Analyze the creator profile and determine:
1. Their PRIMARY NICHE (only one)
2. Which product modules should be enabled for them

‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
CREATOR PROFILE DATA:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
{{ JSON.stringify($json, null, 2) }}

‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
ALLOWED NICHES (choose exactly ONE):
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- beauty
- fashion
- fitness
- food
- lifestyle
- gaming
- finance
- education
- parenting
- travel
- tech
- music
- business
- entertainment
- other

‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
MODULE RECOMMENDATIONS:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
For each niche, decide if these should be enabled:

**benchmarks** - Niche-specific performance benchmarks
  ‚Üí Enable for: beauty, fashion, fitness, gaming, finance
  ‚Üí Skip for: other, entertainment (too broad)

**brand_marketplace** - Curated brand collaboration opportunities
  ‚Üí Enable for all niches EXCEPT "other"
  ‚Üí Match brands to niche (beauty brands for beauty creators, etc)

**templates** - Content/campaign templates
  ‚Üí Enable for: beauty, fashion, fitness, food, gaming, education
  ‚Üí Skip for: highly creative niches (music, entertainment)

**playbooks** - Step-by-step guides and workflows
  ‚Üí Enable for: finance, business, education, gaming
  ‚Üí Skip for: creative/lifestyle niches

‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
DECISION CRITERIA:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
1. Look at content.ai_niches (AI-detected niches)
2. Check content.primary_niches (platform-detected)
3. Consider monetization signals (brand deals suggest established niche)
4. Pick the niche with highest:
   - Consistency across platforms
   - Monetization potential
   - Brand partnership opportunities

5. If multiple niches are equally strong:
   - Pick the one with more brand opportunities
   - Default to the first AI niche if unclear

‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
OUTPUT FORMAT (STRICT JSON ONLY):
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
{
  "primary_niche": "<one allowed niche>",
  "enabled_modules": {
    "benchmarks": true/false,
    "brand_marketplace": true/false,
    "templates": true/false,
    "playbooks": true/false
  },
  "reasoning": "Brief explanation of why this niche was chosen and which signals were strongest"
}

‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
RULES:
‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
- Return ONLY raw JSON (no markdown, no explanations)
- Choose exactly ONE niche
- Be decisive - avoid "other" unless truly unclear
- Optimize for monetization potential
- Consider the creator's actual content, not just labels

parameters.pythonCode:
"""
Determine creator tier and tier-specific features
Input shape:
item.json.result.{ tiktok?, instagram?, youtube?, twitter?, has_brand_deals }
"""

results = []

for item in _items:
    raw = (item.get("json") or {}).get("result", {})

    # Platform payloads (may or may not exist)
    tiktok = raw.get("tiktok", {}) or {}
    instagram = raw.get("instagram", {}) or {}
    youtube = raw.get("youtube", {}) or {}
    twitter = raw.get("twitter", {}) or {}

    # Extract follower metrics safely
    instagram_followers = instagram.get("follower_count", 0)
    tiktok_followers = tiktok.get("follower_count", 0)
    youtube_subscribers = youtube.get("subscriber_count", 0)
    twitter_followers = twitter.get("follower_count", 0)

    # Highest audience size across platforms
    max_followers = max(
        instagram_followers,
        tiktok_followers,
        youtube_subscribers,
        twitter_followers
    )

    # Determine main platform
    platform_followers = {
        "instagram": instagram_followers,
        "tiktok": tiktok_followers,
        "youtube": youtube_subscribers,
        "twitter": twitter_followers
    }
    main_platform = max(platform_followers, key=platform_followers.get)

    # Determine multi-platform presence (1k+ audience rule)
    active_platforms = sum(1 for v in platform_followers.values() if v >= 1000)
    is_multi_platform = active_platforms >= 2

    # Tier classification
    if max_followers < 5000:
        tier = "nano"
        tier_label = "Nano Creator"
    elif max_followers < 50000:
        tier = "micro"
        tier_label = "Micro Influencer"
    elif max_followers < 250000:
        tier = "mid"
        tier_label = "Mid-Tier Creator"
    else:
        tier = "macro"
        tier_label = "Macro Influencer"

    has_deals = raw.get("has_brand_deals", False)

    tier_config = {
        "tier": {
            "code": tier,
            "label": tier_label,
            "follower_count": max_followers
        },

        "main_platform": main_platform,
        "is_multi_platform": is_multi_platform,

        "show_first": {},
        "enable_tools": {},
        "show_modules": []
    }

    # Nano
    if tier == "nano":
        tier_config["show_first"] = {
            "growth_tips": True,
            "content_calendar": True,
            "engagement_boost": True
        }
        tier_config["enable_tools"] = {
            "basic_analytics": True,
            "hashtag_research": True,
            "posting_scheduler": True,
            "first_brand_deal_guide": True
        }
        tier_config["show_modules"] = [
            "Growth Tools",
            "Content Planning",
            "Engagement Strategies",
            "Getting Your First Brand Deal"
        ]

    # Micro
    elif tier == "micro":
        tier_config["show_first"] = {
            "brand_opportunities": True,
            "rate_calculator": True,
            "media_kit_builder": True
        }
        tier_config["enable_tools"] = {
            "advanced_analytics": True,
            "competitor_tracking": True,
            "collaboration_tracking": True,
            "affiliate_dashboard": True,
            "pitch_templates": True
        }
        tier_config["show_modules"] = [
            "Brand Marketplace",
            "Rate Calculator",
            "Media Kit Generator",
            "Collaboration Tracker",
            "Affiliate Programs"
        ]

    # Mid
    elif tier == "mid":
        tier_config["show_first"] = {
            "contract_templates": True,
            "performance_dashboard": True,
            "team_collaboration": True
        }
        tier_config["enable_tools"] = {
            "full_analytics_suite": True,
            "contract_management": True,
            "invoice_generator": True,
            "campaign_roi_tracking": True,
            "audience_insights": True,
            "whitelabel_reporting": True
        }
        tier_config["show_modules"] = [
            "Contract Management",
            "Performance Dashboard",
            "ROI Tracking",
            "Audience Deep Dive",
            "Professional Reporting"
        ]

    # Macro
    else:
        tier_config["show_first"] = {
            "enterprise_features": True,
            "multi_platform_dashboard": True,
            "team_access": True
        }
        tier_config["enable_tools"] = {
            "enterprise_analytics": True,
            "multi_brand_management": True,
            "team_accounts": True,
            "white_label_reports": True,
            "api_access": True,
            "dedicated_support": True
        }
        tier_config["show_modules"] = [
            "Enterprise Dashboard",
            "Multi-Brand Manager",
            "Team Collaboration",
            "Custom Integrations",
            "Priority Support"
        ]

    # Brand deal bonuses
    if has_deals:
        tier_config["enable_tools"].update({
            "deliverables_tracker": True,
            "payment_tracking": True,
            "brand_relationship_crm": True
        })
        tier_config["show_modules"].insert(0, "Brand Deal Manager")

    # Multi-platform bonuses
    if is_multi_platform:
        tier_config["enable_tools"].update({
            "cross_platform_analytics": True,
            "multi_platform_scheduling": True
        })
        tier_config["show_modules"].append("Cross-Platform Manager")

    results.append({"json": tier_config})

return results

nodes.name: Update CRM Record
nodes.notes: ‚öôÔ∏è CONFIGURE: Map to your CRM custom properties

parameters.content:
## Personalize creator onboarding flows to increase activation rates
**Step by step workflow to enrich creator data with multi social (Instagram, Tiktok, Youtube, Twitter, Onlyfans, Twitch and more) intelligence and analytics to personalize offers and activation flows using the influencer.club API**. [Full explanation](https://influencers.club/creatorbook/personalize-onboarding-for-creators/)
